sentences.en: A novel method for frontal face detection is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种新的正面人脸检测算法.

sentences.en: Airbags protect the driver in the event of a severe frontal impact.
sentences.cn: 汽车若遇到正面猛烈撞击，安全气囊可以保护驾车者。

sentences.en: Broca discovered that the faculty of speech is localized in the third left frontal convolution.
sentences.cn: 卜洛卡发现说话的机能位于左大脑第三额回.

sentences.en: By monitoring their brain waves, he saw a pattern of high frequency neural activity in the right frontal cortex that identified in advance who would solve a puzzle through insight and who would not.
sentences.cn: 通过脑电波监测，他发现这些人在解开谜语之前，其右额叶皮质会出现一种高频率的神经活动，通常在得出答案的八秒钟甚至更短的时间内发生。

sentences.en: He launches a frontal attack on working-class organizations.
sentences.cn: 他对工薪阶层组织发起正面挑战。

sentences.en: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
sentences.cn: 他首创了被称为额叶切断术的外科手术。

sentences.en: In rats brain, MTR showed different values between pons and frontal lobe.
sentences.cn: 并且在大白鼠脑显示出桥脑高于额叶.

sentences.en: Sally now resolved to brace up and risk a frontal attack.
sentences.cn: 于是萨利决定鼓足勇气,冒险正面进攻.

sentences.en: The amygdala also sends information back to the frontal cortex.
sentences.cn: 扁桃体也会将讯息传回额叶皮质.

sentences.en: The battle plan for the frontal assault had been completed.
sentences.cn: 就在正面进攻的作战方案已经准备就绪.

sentences.en: The enemy made a frontal attack on our troops.
sentences.cn: 敌人对我们的部队发动了一次正面的进攻.

sentences.en: the frontal armour of the new tanks
The study centers on part of the frontal lobe called Broca's area.
sentences.cn: 研究集中在额叶上一块叫布洛卡区的部位上.

sentences.en: They are eager to confront their guests with full frontal interrogations about their marriages.
sentences.cn: 他们急于当面直接质问客人的婚姻情况。

sentences.en: This way of fighting is vastly different from purely frontal defence.
sentences.cn: 这种战法,比较单纯的正面防御大有区别.

sentences.en: We had to remove a little section of your frontal lobe.
sentences.cn: 我们必须得移除你前额的一部分.

sentences.en: Why is full-frontal male nudity still so scarce in films?
sentences.cn: 为什么男性正面全裸的镜头在电影里还是如此少见呢？

words.tran_cn: 额的；[气象]正面的，前面的

phrases.tran_cn: 正面；锋面；最大截面；额区
锋区；锋带；锋面；前缘地带

trans.tran_en: at or relating to the front part of something
